title.narrative: Supporting Yangtze Delta Region cities with their climate change risk adaption plan

description.narrative: The project is designed to develop a climate change self-assessment tool to help Yangtze River Delta Region cities draw up climate change adaptation plans, supporting the efforts of these cities to be among China's National Development and Reform Commission's 30 demonstration cities for climate change adaptation. As the project is implemented, UK expertise on infrastructure policy and services may be accepted by Chinese policy makers, potentially generating opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.
